data.text:
Our training for the 
Spring Tennō Shō has begun in earnest.
data.processed:
<story>Our training for the 
<story>Spring Tennō Shō has begun in earnest.

data.text:
Controlling my breathing 
has gotten much easier.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Controlling my breathing 
<story>has gotten much easier.

data.text:
Now that we've finished today's regimen, 
what do we do now?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Now that we've finished today's regimen, 
<story>what do we do now?

data.text:
If it's okay with you, 
I'd like to continue running.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>If it's okay with you, 
<story>I'd like to continue running.

data.text:
Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
and she looks like she really wants to…
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
<story>and she looks like she really wants to…

data.text:
Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
and she looks like she really wants to…
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
<story>and she looks like she really wants to…

data.text:
Hehe, thank you. 
I could never be satisfied with that amount of training.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, thank you. 
<story>I could never be satisfied with that amount of training.

data.text: Here I go!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Here I go!

data.text:
It feels as though this is the first time I've truly trained with 
Mejiro McQueen since inheriting this team.
data.processed:
<story>It feels as though this is the first time I've truly trained with 
<story>Mejiro McQueen since inheriting this team.

data.text:
I guess this is because we finally have a 
goal we're striving towards, together.
data.processed:
<story>I guess this is because we finally have a 
<story>goal we're striving towards, together.

data.text:
I guess this is because we finally have a 
goal we're striving towards, together.
data.processed:
<story>I guess this is because we finally have a 
<story>goal we're striving towards, together.

data.text:
Trainer-san, hello! 
McQueen is looking great!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, hello! 
<story>McQueen is looking great!

data.text: Oh, hey Ryan.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Oh, hey Ryan.

data.text: Oh, hey Ryan.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Oh, hey Ryan.

data.text: Mejiro Ryan looked so happy for her.
data.processed: <story>Mejiro Ryan looked so happy for her.

data.text:
The only reason that Mejiro McQueen was able to recover was 
because of the advice you gave me, Mejiro Ryan.
data.processed:
<story>The only reason that Mejiro McQueen was able to recover was 
<story>because of the advice you gave me, Mejiro Ryan.

data.text:
Now that my rival is back in form, I have to do my best to try 
and win the Spring Tennō Shō as well!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Now that my rival is back in form, I have to do my best to try 
<story>and win the Spring Tennō Shō as well!

data.text:
Ehehe, thank you too. 
I'm so glad I talked you.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, thank you too. 
<story>I'm so glad I talked you.

data.text:
This race is getting exciting, huh? 
Even though I'll be the one winning it!
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>This race is getting exciting, huh? 
<story>Even though I'll be the one winning it!

data.text:
In order to win the Spring Tennō Shō, we need to make sure that 
Mejiro McQueen is in top condition.
data.processed:
<story>In order to win the Spring Tennō Shō, we need to make sure that 
<story>Mejiro McQueen is in top condition.

In order to win the Spring Tennō Shō, we need to make sure that

data.text:
A few days later… the day that Mejiro McQueen had been longing 
for finally arrived, the Spring Tennō Shō.
data.processed:
<story>A few days later… the day that Mejiro McQueen had been longing 
<story>for finally arrived, the Spring Tennō Shō.

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…

data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: So what do you want to eat after the race?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>So what do you want to eat after the race?

data.text:
Eh…? Err, well… We are in Kyoto, 
so how about some local cuisine?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Eh…? Err, well… We are in Kyoto, 
<story>so how about some local cuisine?

data.text: Okay…
data.name: <username>

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Um… that was an awful 
attempt at relieving the tension.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Um… that was an awful 
<story>attempt at relieving the tension.

data.text: Seems so…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Seems so…

data.text:
Jeez, get it together. Keeping calm is an 
important skill for trainers you know.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Jeez, get it together. Keeping calm is an 
<story>important skill for trainers you know.

data.text:
I'm worried that you've already 
lost all of your motivation.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I'm worried that you've already 
<story>lost all of your motivation.

data.text:
It's times like this that make 
me envy Sensei's sociable nature.
data.processed:
<story>It's times like this that make 
<story>me envy Sensei's sociable nature.

data.text:
Unlike Sensei, I'm unable to put on a 
cheerful facade to help her relax. But…

choices.text: I'll be cheering you on instead!

data.text:
My dream is finally within my grasp. 
Now I just need to reach out and grab it.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: I'll definitely win, just you wait!
